short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sully supercharges your EHR with an AI-driven assistant that helps you with your clinical documentation, actions and Q&A.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your healthcare workflow with Sully.ai, an innovative Chrome extension that seamlessly integrates with your EHR/EMR system. Powered by advanced AI technology, Sully.ai introduces a team of specialized AI medical employees designed to streamline your clinical practice and enhance patient care.

Meet Your AI Medical Team

üìù Sully the Scribe
Generate notes from conversations

Sully excels at capturing every crucial detail during patient consultations, allowing physicians to focus entirely on patient care. With exceptional listening skills and discretion, Sully creates comprehensive and accurate medical notes. Their unobtrusive presence and dedication to confidentiality make them an indispensable part of the healthcare team.

- Document patient encounters accurately.
- Transcribe doctor‚Äôs notes promptly.
- Update electronic health records.
- Maintain patient confidentiality always.
- Organize medical documentation systematically.

üè• Sully the Nurse
Coordinate patient care activities.

Sully brings compassion and expertise to every patient interaction, providing care that goes beyond physical needs. With a gentle touch and attentive listening, Sully comforts patients and addresses their concerns with empathy. Colleagues admire Sully‚Äôs clinical skills and dedication, while patients feel safe and understood in Sully‚Äôs capable hands.

- Assess patient conditions thoroughly.
- Administer medications as prescribed.
- Educate patients about treatments.
- Monitor patient progress closely.
- Document nursing care provided.

üë©‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è Sully the Medical Assistant

Patients appreciate Sully‚Äôs ability to make complex processes feel effortless, always greeting them with a reassuring smile that puts them at ease.

- Record patient‚Äôs vital signs accurately.
- Schedule appointments through the system.
- Assist doctor during procedures.
- Schedule follow-up appointments.
- Provide patients with care instructions.

üíº Sully the Admin Assistant
Handle administrative office tasks

Sully is the backbone of the office, seamlessly handling administrative tasks with professionalism and discretion. Always one step ahead, Sully organizes schedules, coordinates meetings, and manages correspondence with impeccable efficiency. Team members appreciate Sully‚Äôs reliability and proactive approach, knowing that with Sully‚Äôs support, everything runs smoothly.

- Organize office files systematically.
- Schedule meetings and appointments.
- Handle emails and correspondence.
- Prepare documents and reports.
- Order office supplies timely.

Getting Started

1. Install the Sully.ai Chrome extension
2. Log in to your Sully account to access all features
3. Start working with your AI Employees
